sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ADTOrderProvider</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ADTOrderProvider</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ADTOrderProvider = Class.create();
ADTOrderProvider.prototype = {
	
    initialize: function(tableName, stepSize, columnName) {
		this.tableName = tableName;
		this.stepSize = gs.nil(stepSize) ? 100 : stepSize;
		this.columnName = gs.nil(columnName) ? ADTConstants.ORDER : columnName;
    },

	getNext: function() {
		var glideAggregate = new GlideAggregate(this.tableName);
		glideAggregate.addAggregate('MAX', this.columnName);
		glideAggregate.setGroup(false);
		glideAggregate.query();
		var prevMax = glideAggregate.next() ? new Number(glideAggregate.getAggregate('MAX', this.columnName)) : 0;
		return prevMax + this.stepSize;
	},
	
    type: 'ADTOrderProvider'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-11-14 13:09:20</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1ccffaa6c7c1001063e1e5e603c26020</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ADTOrderProvider</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Application Diagnostics Tool" source="com.snc.app_diagnostics_tool">822052ab47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4382</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1ccffaa6c7c1001063e1e5e603c26020</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-11-27 08:59:03</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
